front.title: Multi-Domain Authentication and Key Exchange Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes a protocol which allows to authenticatesystems and establish Security Associations in networks withdifferent domains of security. The protocol is not only end-to-end,but it involves all participating systems in a single exchange.Further it allows security gateways to derive sub-policies forcrossing (encrypted) IPSec-traffic from 'conventional' packetfiltering rules in a trusted manner.
